channel.title: TaiwanPlus - Latest News
channel.description: Your source of news, culture, and infotainment from Taiwan, a voice of freedom in Asia.

item.title: Taiwan's 'I Love You' Day Sees Newlyweds Riding on Oxcarts
item.description: May 20, known as "I Love You" day in Taiwan, this year sees couples officially married while riding oxcarts in the country's south.

item.title: Taiwan's New President Faces Mounting Economic Challenges
item.description: Newly inaugurated President Lai Ching-te will need to tackle the country's low wages, inflation and some of the highest housing prices in the world. It comes as new polling shows t

item.title: Opposition Kuomintang Gives Its Verdict on Lai's Inauguration
item.description: Taiwan's main opposition Kuomintang has sent good wishes to President Lai Ching-te on his inauguration without holding back on criticism.

item.title: China Gives Antagonistic Response to President Lai's Inauguration
item.description: On the day of his inauguration, China accuses Taiwan's new president, Lai Ching-te, of inciting cross-strait confrontation.
